title: 装了永恒之器MOD游戏就玩不了了
author: s958282723
txt_content:
Forge Mod Loader has found a problem with your minecraft installation 
The mods and versions listed below could not be found
SCO_SpaceCpre:any
The file 'ForgeModLoader-client-O.log' contains more information
每次进入游戏就显示这个

replies.author: 求工业2
replies.txt_content: 我安过工业2MOD后也遇到过，但也不知道为什么

replies.author: t106ao
replies.txt_content:
缺少前置mod SpaceCore
地址
http://spacechase0.com/minecraft/mods/spacecore/
